mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum as rnum, a.* from ( select prod_id, prod_name, lprod_nm, prod_insdate from prod, lprod where prod_lgu = lprod_gu order by prod_id ) a ) where rnum between #{page}*#{pageSize}-(#{pageSize}-1) and #{page}*#{pageSize}
select prod_id, prod_name, lprod_nm, buyer_name, buyer_mail from prod, lprod, buyer where buyer_id = prod_buyer and prod_lgu = lprod_gu and prod_id = #{prod_id}
select count(*) from prod,lprod where prod_lgu = lprod_gu
